reference.shortdesc: The text element serves as a container for text. It has no associated semantics.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The text element is primarily used as a specialization base or to enable reuse. The text can contain only text or nested text elements.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the text element is used to contain text that is intended to be reused:
example.codeblock: This an example of Text that is reusable, with no extra semantics attached to the text.
